traits.label: tag
traits.name: :tag
traits.desc: Tag to use, if of type 'heading' only

traits.label: side
traits.name: :side
traits.desc: Side to place the timeline entry; Works only if QTimeline layout is loose.

traits.label: icon
traits.name: :icon
traits.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix; If 'none' (String) is used as value then no icon is rendered (but screen real estate will still be used for it)

traits.label: avatar
traits.name: :avatar
traits.desc: URL to the avatar image; Icon takes precedence if used, so it replaces avatar

traits.label: color
traits.name: :color
traits.desc: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette

traits.label: title
traits.name: :title
traits.desc: Title of timeline entry; Is overridden if using 'title' slot

traits.label: subtitle
traits.name: :subtitle
traits.desc: Subtitle of timeline entry; Is overridden if using 'subtitle' slot

traits.label: body
traits.name: :body
traits.desc: Body content of timeline entry; Use this prop or the default slot
examples: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
